images.description: The primary logo for the VŠE PRO STAVBY.CZ website, featuring the company name in white, likely intended for use against darker backgrounds or as a standalone identity mark. The current dimensions (1024x609) are likely larger than needed for typical logo display, suggesting it might be used at a reduced size.
images.suggested_usage: Resize and optimize for web. Use as the main site logo in the header/navigation. Consider creating an SVG version for scalability. Ensure proper alt text is added for accessibility, e.g., 'VŠE PRO STAVBY.CZ logo'.

images.description: An image depicting a finished building project or a significant structure, possibly in Tanvald as suggested by the original filename. It appears to be a photographic representation of the company's work, likely used to showcase completed projects or services.
images.suggested_usage: Use in a project gallery, portfolio section, or as a supporting image on service pages to visually represent completed work. Add descriptive alt text, e.g., 'Completed building project in Tanvald' or 'New building construction by VŠE PRO STAVBY.CZ'.

images.description: An image of a residential house, likely a construction or renovation project undertaken by VŠE PRO STAVBY.CZ. The filename 'RDPO' is a technical or internal reference, but from a user perspective, it represents a residential dwelling.
images.suggested_usage: Use in a project showcase, a 'Residential Projects' section, or on a page discussing house construction/reconstruction services. Ensure human-readable alt text is provided, such as 'Renovation of a residential house' or 'Completed new build residential project'.
